fields.name: INFO_LSD
fields.desc: Locus specific database was used to submit the variant

fields.name: INFO_ASP
fields.desc: Is Assembly specific. This is set if the variant only maps to one assembly

fields.name: INFO_SYN
fields.desc: coding region variation where one allele in the set does not change the encoded amino acid

fields.name: INFO_CDA
fields.desc: variant studied in clinical assay

fields.name: REF
fields.desc: The value in the POS field refers to the position of the first base in the String.

fields.name: INFO_CLNSRC
fields.desc: Variant Clinical Chanels

fields.name: INFO_CFL
fields.desc: Has Assembly conflict. This is for weight 1 and 2 variant that maps to different chromosomes on different assemblies.

fields.name: INFO_COMMON
fields.desc: Common variant based on 1000 genomes project, MAF>=1% for >=1 population

fields.name: POS
fields.desc: The reference position.

fields.name: INFO_VLD
fields.desc: Is Validated.  This bit is set if the variant has 2+ minor allele count based on frequency or genotype data.

fields.name: CHROM
fields.desc: Chromosome identifier.

fields.name: INFO_SSR
fields.desc: There are reasons to suspect the variant to be false positive: true, false

fields.name: INFO_CLNDSDBID
fields.desc: Variant disease database ID

fields.name: INFO_CLNDBN
fields.desc: Variant disease name

fields.name: INFO_REF
fields.desc: coding region variation where one allele in the set is identical to the reference sequence

fields.name: INFO_CLNACC
fields.desc: Variant Accession and Versions

fields.name: INFO_PM
fields.desc: Variant is Precious(Clinical,Pubmed Cited)

fields.name: INFO_SAO
fields.desc: Variant allele origin.

fields.name: INFO_CLNORIGIN
fields.desc: unknown, germline, somatic, inherited, parental, maternal, de-novo, biparental, uniparental, not-tested, tested-inconclusive, other

fields.name: INFO_CLNREVSTAT
fields.desc: no_assertion - No assertion provided, no_criteria - No assertion criteria provided, single - Criteria provided single submitter, mult - Criteria provided multiple submitters no conflicts, conf - Criteria provided conflicting interpretations, exp - Reviewed by expert panel, guideline - Practice guideline

fields.name: INFO_MUT
fields.desc: Is mutation (journal citation, explicit fact): a low frequency variation that is cited in journal and other reputable sources

fields.name: INFO_VC
fields.desc: SNV (single nucleotide variant), insertion, deletion, indel, MNP (multiple nucleotide polymorphism), MNV (multiple nucleotide variant), duplication, sequence alteration, inversion, microsatellite, monomeric repeat, CNL (copy number loss), CNG (copy number gain), CNV (copy number variation), MEI (mobile element insertion), NSI (novel sequence insertion), complex, tandem duplication, translocation, no variation

fields.name: INFO_TPA
fields.desc: Provisional Third Party Annotation(TPA) (currently rs from PHARMGKB who will give phenotype data)

fields.name: INFO_CLNSIG
fields.desc: Vuncertain, not provided, benign, likely benign, likely pathogenic, pathogenic, drug response, histocompatibility, 255 - other

fields.name: INFO_RS
fields.desc: dbSNP ID (i.e. rs number)

fields.name: INFO_WTD
fields.desc: Locus specific database was used to submit the variant

fields.name: ALT
fields.desc: Comma separated list of alternate non-reference alleles called on at least one of the samples.

fields.name: INFO_CLNDSDB
fields.desc: Variant disease database name
